cards.rule: I will win pink 3
I will win exactly 2 tricks and they will be in a row
I will win none of the first 3 tricks
I will win a trick that contains only odd-numbered cards
I will win only the first trick
I will win as many pink as blue cards in one trick
I will win no yellow
I will win no 9
I will win no submarine
I will win no 1, 2, or 3
I will win at least 2x 7
I will win more tricks than everyone else combined
I will win no pink
I will win exactly 3 tricks and they will be in a row
I will win a trick using a 3
I will win a trick of which the card values are all less than 7 (Submarines are not allowed in the trick)
I will win green 3, yellow 4, and yellow 5
I will win exactly 1x pink
I will win as many pink as yellow cards
I will win a trick using a 5
I will win at least 3x 9
I will win a trick with a total value less than: 8 (3 players), 12 (4 players), 16 (5 players) (Submarines are not allowed in the trick)
I will win exactly 3x submarines (If submarine cards 1,2,3,4 are in one hand, re-deal the playing cards)
I will win a trick using a 6
I will win submarine 2 and no other submarine (If submarine cards 2 and 4 or 1,2,3 are in one hand, re-deal the playing cards)
I will win pink 8, blue 5
I will win at least 5x pink
I will win a 6 with another 6
I will not open a trick with yellow or pink or blue
I will win none of the first 4 tricks
I will win a trick using a 2
I will win exactly 2 tricks
I will win pink 9 and yellow 8
I will win exactly 1 trick
I will win pink 1 and green 7
I will win X tricks (Note your prediction and share it with the crew)
I will win exactly 2x green
I will win yellow 9 and blue 7
I will win 2 tricks in a row
I will win the first and the last trick
I will win 0 tricks
I will win green 2 in the final trick of the game
I will win no 5
I will win more tricks than anyone else
